publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1235 Nicola Sturgeon: The Draft Community Care (Personal Care and Nursing Care) (Scotland) Amendment Regulations 2008—That the Health and Sport Committee recommends that the draft Community Care (Personal Care and Nursing Care) (Scotland) Amendment Regulations 2008 be approved. Supported by: Shona Robison*
